channel.title: Chris ter Beke
channel.description: Recent content on Chris ter Beke

item.title: About
item.description: Cloud Consultant @ Binx.io (2022 - now) Link to heading Part of Xebia, Binx.io organizes your cloud journey, develops cloud native solutions, trains your teams, and provides managed cloud services. As cloud consultant, I help customers in different industries bring their applications to the cloud, specifically focussing on Google Cloud Platform. Read my articles on Binx.io → Professional Cloud Architect Certification → Software Architect @ Ultimaker (2017 - 2021) Link to heading Ultimaker’s mission is to accelerate the world’s transition to local manufacturing and digital distribution.
